name: tributary-cli-comprehensive-test-suite
description: Complete testing framework for Tributary CLI application covering T001-T220 test cases across 8 comprehensive phases

scripts.test:basic: node basic-cli-functions/test-t001-only.js && node basic-cli-functions/test-t002-only.js && node basic-cli-functions/test-t003-only.js && node basic-cli-functions/test-t004-only.js && node basic-cli-functions/test-t005-only.js && node basic-cli-functions/t010-retest.js && node basic-cli-functions/t020-basic-distribution-simulation-test.js && node basic-cli-functions/t030-dry-run-execution-test.js
scripts.validate:config: node -e "console.log('Config validation - ensure test-config.json is properly configured')"
scripts.setup: cp test-config.json.template test-config.json && echo 'Template copied. Please update test-config.json with your values.'
scripts.report: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('./test-execution-report.json')) { console.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./test-execution-report.json')), null, 2)); } else { console.log('No test report found. Run tests first.'); }"

author: Tributary Testing Team

phase1.name: Basic CLI Functions
phase1.description: Core CLI functionality, initialization, configuration validation

phase3.name: Performance Testing
phase3.description: Timeout handling, retry mechanisms, resource management

phase4.name: Production Preparation
phase4.description: Mainnet readiness, audit logging, production safety

phase5.name: Parameter Management
phase5.description: Output formats, network switching, parameter validation

phase6.name: Advanced Features
phase6.description: File operations, backup functionality, custom configurations

phase7.name: Extended Features
phase7.description: Version management, large file processing, memory optimization

phase8.name: Comprehensive Coverage
phase8.description: Security validation, vulnerability testing, comprehensive assessment
